DOC.brief_summary: Care people suffer depressive symptom give step-wise approach . One first step provision self-help material . Online self-help innovative way provide self-help . The investigator want study effect interactive online self-help-program ( Deprexis ) treatment mild moderate depressive symptom . Participants randomise either twelve week online-self help waiting-list control . Symptoms depression aspect assess one year period . Thereafter control also receive online-self help . The investigator hypothesise online self-help superior control condition alleviate depressive symptom prevent full blow depression .
DOC.detailed_description: This study support German Ministry Health ( BMG ) collaborative project Universität Bern ( PD Dr. Thomas Berger ) , Charité Berlin ( PD Dr. Matthias Rose ) , Universität Bielefeld ( Prof. Dr. Wolfgang Greiner ) , Universität Hamburg ( Prof. Dr. Steffen Moritz , Prof. Dr. Bernd Löwe ) , GAIA AG Hamburg ( Dr. Björn Meyer ) , Universität Tübingen ( Prof. Dr. Martin Hautzinger ) Universität Trier ( Prof. Dr. Wolfgang Lutz ) .
DOC.criteria: PHQ > 4 < 15 acute suicidality psychotic d/o , bipolar d/o severe psychiatric d/o
